summary: Memorandum for the record regarding a meeting with E. Howard Hunt concerning his memoirs, 'Undercover'. The meeting involved discussions and agreed-upon changes to classified and unclassified items in the manuscript, including those related to a fabricated Shanghai post, the Guatemalan Embassy in Mexico City, and a CIA-Uruguayan telephone monitoring operation.
title: Meeting with E. Howard Hunt Re His Memoirs, "Undercover"
sender: John D. Morrison, Jr., Acting General Counsel
